#summary This page explains the "C-Pull" (Cpll) Nanoarchitecture

*Please note:* The letter "C" means "Code Behind" in Flex 3 applications and "Component" in Flex 4 applications.

= C-Pull (Cpll) Nanoarchitecture =

==== UIComponent (Flex 3) / Skin (Flex 4) with C-Pull ====

{{{
	<s:DropDownList
		id="cb_style"
		minWidth="130"
		width="100%"
		dataProvider="{ hostComponent.appModel.currentLayout.styles }"
		selectedItem="{ hostComponent.appModel.currentStyle }"
		requireSelection="true"
		change="hostComponent.loadStyle(StyleVO( cb_style.selectedItem ))"
		/>
}}}
_Complete source available in the  [http://masuland.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/LoginExampleFx4GumboParsleyMVCpllCtl_PInj/trunk/src/main/flex/com/masuland/loginexample/view/skin/SettingsBoxSkin.mxml svn repo]._

==== Code Behind (Flex 3) / Component (Flex 4) with C-Pull ====

{{{
	[Inject]
	[Bindable]
	public var appModel:AppModel;

	[MessageDispatcher]
	public var dispatcher:Function;

	public function loadStyle(style:StyleVO):void
	{
		dispatcher(new LoadStyleEvent(style));
	}
}}}
_Complete source available in the  [http://masuland.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/LoginExampleFx4GumboParsleyMVCpllCtl_PInj/trunk/src/main/flex/com/masuland/loginexample/view/component/SettingsBoxCP.as svn repo]._
